title: 新手任务第二个换头像我换完了为什么没有完成
author: Lyx_001
txt_content: 刚来这，新手第二个任务我把头像换了，但是那里没有显示我完成任务了，应该怎么办

replies.author: 剑齿虎
replies.txt_content: ctrl+f5

replies.author: edlzecffgt
replies.txt_content:
老bug了吧
点一下领取奖励试试

replies.author: 北极仙光
replies.txt_content: Ctrl+F5刷新

replies.author: 二酱
replies.txt_content: 刷新一下

replies.author: Noreied
replies.txt_content: 泥潭特性，不过我们都看见了

replies.author: 化胡
replies.txt_content: 显示没有完成，你直接点领取就行

replies.author: yl2388390392
replies.txt_content: 再换亿次
点一下任务，进去里面应该是完成的，点里面的完成任务就行

replies.author: 苦力怕553
replies.txt_content: 直接点领取即可。泥潭老bug了

replies.author: 社会你龍哥
replies.txt_content: 泥 潭 特 性

replies.author: j19950909
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人加入

replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content: 硬点那个领取任务按钮

replies.author: 沉默是金…
replies.txt_content: 你要先申请，然后再换。如果不行的话，可以取消任务重新申请一次试试

replies.author: 兔子BUG
replies.txt_content: 刷新就行了

replies.author: 小林最牛
replies.txt_content: 直接点领取任务就可以了

replies.author: yege
replies.txt_content: 我现在没办法换头像

replies.author: 姜乐乐
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xiang_xge
replies.txt_content: 管它是不是灰的，你要是确定你完成了点就是了

replies.author: SiGWs
replies.txt_content: 刷新，清缓存

replies.author: PTSD∝龌龊闵
replies.txt_content: 点击领取就行了

replies.author: 熊猫黑小白
replies.txt_content: 刷新吧，老论坛BUG了

replies.author: minecraft小器
replies.txt_content: 论坛的bug，好像上一次更新后就有了

replies.author: 凌乱发际线
replies.txt_content: 得刷新Ctrl+F5

replies.author: Comedesrt
replies.txt_content: 点开任务，看看能不能直接领奖

replies.author: 社会你龍哥
replies.txt_content: 泥潭老特性了

replies.author: aa27460
replies.txt_content: 没刷新而已 刷新就好了

replies.author: qq852810523
replies.txt_content: 老特性了，点进去任务详情
